titleStmt.title: A letter sent to His Majestie, from the Lords justices, and councell in Ireland, April 23. 1642. Concerning His Majesties resolution to go into Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
